title: CNN Image Depth Extraction
description: University Honours Research Project that explored the use of a bio-inspired Convolutional Neural Network to extract depth from images. The project was completed in 2023 and was supervised by Luke Hallum
what: Construct a Convolutional Neural Network that extracts depth from images using a bio-inspired approach.
how: Utilisting Keras and Python, the CNN was designed based on literature of human depth perception mechanisms and cells in the visual cortex.
Network was trained on correlated and anti-correlated Random Dot Sterograms variations to validate the model's performance against human results.
result: The model was successfully able to extract depth from images, mimicing results seen from human trails found in literature.
